title: Cant open client
body: I cannot open the client. I try to open it like normal client, i wait 5 min but nothing happens. might be my computer but not sure

replies.body: It's most likely because of the Alpha never actually going through prompts and opening up for you to see, usually if you get off the main League Client and go on the Alpha Client, it would normally prompt you that the Main Client is still running in the background. So you just open up task manager and go to processes and close/stop the running processes that is the league client.
